languages.text:
Персонаж не может выбрать другого персонажа целью одиночного выстрела или {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очереди{/g}, если тот находится от него на расстоянии, превышающей максимальную дальность стрельбы.
Параметры максимальной и эффективной дальности стрельбы могут отличаться у разных единиц оружия.
Дистанционная {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} по цели, находящейся в области эффективной дальности стрельбы, не имеет базовых негативных модификаторов от дальности цели.
При дистанционной атаке по цели, находящейся в области максимальной дальности стрельбы:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Одиночный выстрел{/g} имеет шанс попадания вдвое ниже, чем шанс попадания в эффективной области стрельбы.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Стрельба очередью имеет шанс выстрела по центральной траектории вдвое ниже, а количество возможных траекторий отклонения вдвое больше за счет увеличения разброса и конуса стрельбы.</indent>

A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Персонаж не может выбрать другого персонажа целью одиночного выстрела или {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очереди{/g}, если тот находится от него на расстоянии, превышающей максимальную дальность стрельбы.
Параметры максимальной и эффективной дальности стрельбы могут отличаться у разных единиц оружия.
Дистанционная {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} по цели, находящейся в области эффективной дальности стрельбы, не имеет базовых негативных модификаторов от дальности цели.
При дистанционной атаке по цели, находящейся в области максимальной дальности стрельбы:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Одиночный выстрел{/g} имеет шанс попадания вдвое ниже, чем шанс попадания в эффективной области стрельбы.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Стрельба очередью имеет шанс выстрела по центральной траектории вдвое ниже, а количество возможных траекторий отклонения вдвое больше за счет увеличения разброса и конуса стрельбы.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
A character cannot target another character with a single shot or a burst if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons. Area attacks do not have these parameters.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no base penalties imposed by the distance to the target.
When making a ranged attack against a target within the weapon's maximum range:
- Single shots have half as high chance to hit compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.
- Burst shots have half as high chance to follow the central trajectory, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.

A character cannot target another character with a single shot or a burst if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons. Area attacks do not have these parameters.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no base penalties imposed by the distance to the target.
When making a ranged attack against a target within the weapon's maximum range:
- Single shots have half as high chance to hit compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.
- Burst shots have half as high chance to follow the central trajectory, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.

A character cannot target another character with a single shot or a burst if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons. Area attacks do not have these parameters.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no penalties due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
- Single shots' chance to hit is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.
- Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.

A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>

A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>

languages.text:
Ein Charakter kann einen anderen Charakter nicht mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g} oder einer {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g} angreifen, wenn sich das Ziel außerhalb der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe befindet.
Die effektive und maximale Reichweite ist von Waffe zu Waffe verschieden.
Ein Fernkampfangriff auf ein Ziel innerhalb der effektiven Reichweite der Waffe hat keine {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} aufgrund der Entfernung des Ziels.
Wenn ein Fernkampfangriff auf ein Ziel zwischen der maximalen effektiven Reichweite und der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe erfolgt:
-<indent=5%>Bei Einzelschüssen wird die Chance auf einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} im Vergleich zu Angriffen auf Ziele innerhalb der effektiven Reichweite halbiert.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die Chance, dass Salven der zentralen Flugbahn folgen, wird halbiert. Die Zahl der aufgrund des erweiterten Schusskegels möglichen Abweichungen von der Flugbahn verdoppelt sich.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Ein Charakter kann einen anderen Charakter nicht mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salvenschuss{/g} anvisieren, wenn sich das Ziel außerhalb der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} seiner Waffe befindet.
Effektive und maximale Reichweiten unterscheiden sich bei verschiedenen Waffen. {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} besitzen diese Parameter nicht.
Ein Fernkampfangriff auf ein Ziel innerhalb der effektiven Reichweite der Waffe erleidet keine {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} aufgrund der Entfernung des Ziels.
Beim Ausführen eines Fernkampfangriffs auf ein Ziel zwischen der effektiven und maximalen Reichweite der Waffe gilt:
- Die {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g}chance von Einzelschüssen wird im Vergleich zu Angriffen auf Ziele innerhalb der effektiven Reichweite halbiert.
- Die Chance von Salvenschüssen, der zentralen Geschossbahn zu folgen, wird halbiert und die Anzahl möglicher abweichenden Geschossbahnen verdoppelt sich aufgrund des erweiterten Feuerkegels.

Ein Charakter kann einen anderen Charakter nicht mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g} oder einer {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g} angreifen, wenn sich das Ziel außerhalb der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe befindet.
Die effektive und maximale Reichweite ist von Waffe zu Waffe verschieden.
Ein Fernkampfangriff auf ein Ziel innerhalb der effektiven Reichweite der Waffe hat keine {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} aufgrund der Entfernung des Ziels.
Wenn ein Fernkampfangriff auf ein Ziel zwischen der maximalen effektiven Reichweite und der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe erfolgt:
-<indent=5%>Bei Einzelschüssen wird die Chance auf einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} im Vergleich zu Angriffen auf Ziele innerhalb der effektiven Reichweite halbiert.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die Chance, dass Salven der zentralen Flugbahn folgen, wird halbiert. Die Zahl der aufgrund des erweiterten Schusskegels möglichen Abweichungen von der Flugbahn verdoppelt sich.</indent>

languages.text:
Un personnage ne peut pas en cibler un autre avec un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tir au coup par coup{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} si sa cible se trouve au-delà de la portée maximale de son arme.
Les portées efficaces et maximales varient selon les armes.
Une attaque à distance contre une cible à portée efficace ne subit pas de {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} de distance.
Lors d'une attaque à distance contre une cible au-delà de la portée efficace et en deçà de la portée maximale de l'arme :
-<indent=5%>Les chances de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} des tirs au coup par coup sont réduites de moitié par rapport aux attaques lancées contre des cibles à portée efficace.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les chances que les tirs en rafale suivent la trajectoire centrale sont réduites de moitié, et le nombre de déviations possibles est doublé du fait de l'élargissement du cône de tir.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Un personnage ne peut pas en cibler un autre avec un {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tir unique{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} si sa cible se trouve au-delà de la portée maximale de son arme.
Les portées efficaces et maximales varient selon les armes.
Une attaque à distance contre une cible à portée efficace ne subit pas de {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} de distance.
Lors d'une attaque à distance contre une cible au-delà de la portée efficace et en deçà de la portée maximale de l'arme :
- <indent=5%>Les chances des tirs uniques de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}faire mouche{/g} sont réduites de moitié par rapport aux attaques lancées contre des cibles à portée efficace.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Les chances que les tirs en rafale suivent la trajectoire centrale sont réduites de moitié, et le nombre de déviations possibles est doublé du fait de l'élargissement du cône de tir.</indent>

languages.text:
当目标在武器的最大射程外时，您的角色将无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击攻击目标。
每把远程武器的有效射程与最大射程都各自不同。
当进行远程攻击时，只要目标处于武器有效射程内，无论目标与攻击者距离多远，攻击者的命中率都不会降低。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}
当目标位于武器的有效射程之外，但在最大射程之内时：
- <indent=5%>与有效射程之内的射击相比，单发射击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}率会降低一半。</indent>
- <indent=5%>连发射击时，子弹沿着中央轨迹飞行的几率降低一半，子弹可能偏移的范围会扩大一倍。</indent>
languages.original_text:
A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
当目标在武器的最大射程外时，您的角色将无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击攻击目标。
每把远程武器的有效射程与最大射程都各自不同。
当进行远程攻击时，只要目标处于武器有效射程内，无论目标与攻击者距离多远，攻击者的命中率都不会降低。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}
当目标位于武器的有效射程之外，但在最大射程之内时：
- <indent=5%>与有效射程之内的射击相比，单发射击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}率会降低一半。</indent>
- <indent=5%>连发射击时，子弹沿着中央轨迹飞行的几率降低一半，子弹可能偏移的范围会扩大一倍。</indent>

languages.text:
Un personaje no puede marcar como objetivo a otro con un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} si este último no se encuentra dentro del alcance máximo de su arma.
Cada arma tiene su propio alcance efectivo y máximo.
Debido a la distancia del objetivo, los ataques a distancia que se hagan dentro del alcance efectivo del arma no sufren {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g}.
Al asestar un ataque a distancia a un objetivo situado entre el alcance efectivo y máximo de un arma:
-<indent=5%>Se reduce a la mitad la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de los ataques de un solo disparo, en comparación con los ataques que se realizan a objetivos situados dentro del alcance efectivo.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Se reduce a la mitad la probabilidad de que los disparos de ráfaga sigan la trayectoria central. Asimismo, se duplica el número de posibles trayectorias de desvío por el aumento del cono de disparo.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Un personaje no puede marcar como objetivo a otro con un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} si este último no se encuentra dentro del alcance máximo de su arma.
Cada arma tiene su propio alcance efectivo y máximo.
Debido a la distancia del objetivo, los ataques a distancia que se hagan dentro del alcance efectivo del arma no sufren {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g}.
Al asestar un ataque a distancia a un objetivo situado entre el alcance efectivo y máximo de un arma:
-<indent=5%>Se reduce a la mitad la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de los ataques de un solo disparo, en comparación con los ataques que se realizan a objetivos situados dentro del alcance efectivo.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Se reduce a la mitad la probabilidad de que los disparos de ráfaga sigan la trayectoria central. Asimismo, se duplica el número de posibles trayectorias de desvío por el aumento del cono de disparo.</indent>

languages.original_text:
A character cannot select another character as the target of a single shot or queue if that character is at a distance from him or her that exceeds the maximum firing range.
The maximum and effective range parameters may vary from weapon to weapon. Area attacks do not have these parameters.
A ranged attack against a target within effective range has no base negative modifiers to the target's range.
When making a ranged attack against a target within the maximum effective range:
- a single shot has a chance of halving the chance of hitting a target in the effective firing range.
- firing in bursts has half the chance of hitting the centre trajectory and twice the number of possible deflection trajectories due to increased spread and cone of fire.

languages.text:
武器の最大射程外のキャラクターを{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}の標的とすることはできない。
有効射程および最大射程は武器により異なる。
武器の有効射程内のターゲットに対する遠距離攻撃は、ターゲットの距離による{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けない。
武器の最大有効射程と最大射程の間に位置するターゲットに対して遠距離攻撃を行う場合：
- <indent=5%>単発射撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する確率はターゲットに対する有効射程からの攻撃に比べ半減する。</indent>
- <indent=5%>バーストは射線の中心を通る確率が半減するが、攻撃の扇範囲の拡大に伴い、候補の逸脱射線の数は2倍になる。</indent>
languages.original_text:
A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
武器の最大射程外のキャラクターを{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}連射{/g}の標的とすることはできない。
有効射程および最大射程は武器により異なる。
武器の有効射程内のターゲットに対する遠距離攻撃は、ターゲットの距離による{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けない。
武器の最大有効射程と最大射程の間に位置するターゲットに対して遠距離攻撃を行う場合：
- <indent=5%>単発射撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する確率はターゲットに対する有効射程からの攻撃に比べ半減する。</indent>
- <indent=5%>連射は射線の中心を通る確率が半減するが、攻撃の扇範囲の拡大に伴い、候補の逸脱射線の数は2倍になる。</indent>

languages.text:
Bir karakter, silahının maksimum menzilinin dışında olan bir karakteri {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g} ile hedef alamaz.
Etkili ve maksimum menziller, silahlara göre farklılık gösterir.
Silahın etkili menzilinde bulunan bir hedefe karşı yapılan menzilli saldırı, hedefe olan mesafeden kaynaklı herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} almaz.
Silahın maksimum etkili menzili ile maksimum menzili arasında bulunan bir hedefe karşı menzilli saldırı yaparken:
-<indent=5%>Tek atışların {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} olasılığı, etkili menzil içinde bulunan hedeflere yapılan saldırılara kıyasla yarı yarıya azalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Seri atışların merkezî mermi yolunda ilerleme olasılıkları yarı yarıya azalırken olası sapma mermi yollarının sayısı, genişleyen atış konisi sebebiyle iki katına çıkar.</indent>
languages.original_text:
A character cannot target another character with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} if their target is outside their weapon's maximum range.
Effective and maximum ranges vary for different weapons.
A ranged attack against a target within the weapon's effective range suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} due to the target's distance.
When making a ranged attack against a target between the weapon's maximum effective range and maximum range:
-<indent=5%>Single shots' chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} is reduced by half compared to attacks made against targets within the effective range.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Burst shots' chance to follow the central trajectory is reduced by half, and the number of possible deviation trajectories is doubled due to the expanded cone of fire.</indent>
